entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023
